info.title: Azure Load Testing
info.description: These APIs allow end users to create, view and run load tests using Azure Load Test Service.

patch.summary: Associate an app component (Azure resource) to a test or test run.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique name of the app component, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique name of the app component, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get app Component details by unique name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique name of the app component, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get app component for a test or a test run by unique its name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Required testRunId, if testId field is not provided

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

patch.summary: Configure server metrics for a test or test run

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique name for server metrics, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get server metrics configuration by its name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique name for server metrics, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete server metrics configuration by its name

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique name for server metrics, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

204.description: The server metrics configuration is deleted.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get server metrics configuration for a test or test run by its name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Required testRunId, if testId field is not provided

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all default server metrics configuration for supported resource types.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all supported resource types for adding an app component(Azure resource types).

200.description: The supported resource types and metrics for server side metrics

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

patch.summary: Create a new test or update an existing test.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete a test by its name.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get load test details by test name

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all load tests by the fully qualified resource Id e.g subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rg}/providers/Microsoft.LoadTestService/loadtests/{resName}.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort on one of the field - lastModifiedDateTime, displayName, createdBy in (field asc/desc) format. eg: displayName asc.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter search based on searchable fields - testId, createdBy.

parameters.name: lastUpdatedStartTime
parameters.description: Start DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of the last updated time range to filter tests.

parameters.name: lastUpdatedEndTime
parameters.description: End DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of the last updated time range to filter tests.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Continuation token to get the next page of response

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: Number of results in response.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

put.summary: Upload input file for a given test name. File size can't be more than 50 MB. Existing file with same name for the given test will be overwritten. File should be provided in the request body as multipart/form-data.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique name for test file, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get test file by the file name.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique name for test file, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete file by the file name for a test

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique name for test file, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Continuation token to get the next page of response

200.description: The URLs for the requested test files.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete a test run by its name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name for the load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

patch.summary: Create and start a new test run with the given name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name for the load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

parameters.name: oldTestRunId
parameters.description: Existing test run Id that should be rerun.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get test run details by name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name for the load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get test run file by file name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name for the load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique name for test run file, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

200.description: The URL for the requested test run file

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all test runs with given filters

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort on one of the field - status, displayName, executedDateTime in (field asc/desc) format. eg: displayName asc.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Continuation token to get the next page of response

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter search based on searchable fields - description, executedUser.

parameters.name: executionFrom
parameters.description: End DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of test-run execution time filter range.

parameters.name: executionTo
parameters.description: Start DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of test-run execution time filter range.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Comma separated list of test run status.

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: Number of results in response.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name for the load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

200.description: The requested test run is stopped. Call GET /testruns/{testRunId} to check the status.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Lists the metric namespaces for a load test run.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name for the load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

200.description: Successful request to get the list of metric namespaces

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Lists the metric definitions for a load test run.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name for the load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

parameters.name: metricnamespace
parameters.description: Metric namespace to query metric definitions for.

200.description: The requested load test metrics definition

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

post.summary: Lists the metric values for a load test run.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique name for the load test run, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

parameters.name: aggregation
parameters.description: The list of aggregation types (comma separated) to retrieve.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The interval (i.e. timegrain) of the query.

parameters.name: metricname
parameters.description: Metric name

parameters.name: metricnamespace
parameters.description: Metric namespace to query metric definitions for.

parameters.name: resultType
parameters.description: Reduces the set of data collected. The syntax allowed depends on the operation. See the operation's description for details.

schema.description: Reduces the set of data collected. The syntax allowed depends on the operation. See the operation's description for details.

parameters.name: timespan
parameters.description: The timespan of the query. It is a string with the following format 'startDateTime_ISO/endDateTime_ISO'.

items.description: The aggregation type of the metric.

200.description: The requested load test run metrics

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

resourceGroup.description: Resource group name of the Azure resource

subscriptionId.description: Subscription Id of the Azure resource

AppComponent.description: An Azure resource object (Refer azure generic resource model : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/resources/resources/get-by-id#genericresource)

testId.description: [Required, if testRunId is not given] Load test unique name

testRunId.description: [Required if testId is not given] Load test run unique name

value.description: AppComponents collection { resource id (fully qualified resource Id e.g subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rg}/providers/Microsoft.LoadTestService/loadtests/{resName}) : resource object }
The value of the certificate for respective type

defaultMetrics.description: Default metrics collection {resourceType : list of metrics config} (Refer for metrics structure: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/monitor/metric-definitions/list#metricdefinition)

message.description: Error details in case test run was not successfully run.

ErrorDetails20221101.description: Error details if there is any failure in load test run

nextLink.description: Link for the next list of file URLs, if applicable

additionalUrls.description: Additional supported files for the test run

InputTestArtifacts.description: The input artifacts for the test.

engineInstances.description: The number of engine instances to execute load test. Supported values are in range of 1-45. Required for creating a new test.

splitAllCSVs.description: Whether all the input CSV files should be split evenly across all engines.

quickStartTest.description: If true, optionalLoadTestConfig is required and JMX script for the load test is not required to upload.

values.description: The metadata values. Maximum values can be 20.

MetadataFilter.description: The metadatafilter is used to reduce the set of metric data returned. Example: Metric contains metadata A, B and C. - Return all time series of where C is equals to c1 or c2, the metricdatafilter value will be {C, [c1,c2]}

timeseries.description: The time series returned when a data query is performed.

Metric.description: The result data of a query.

timeGrain.description: The time grain specifies the aggregation interval for the metric. Expressed as a duration 'PT1M', 'PT1H', etc.

MetricAvailability.description: Metric availability specifies the time grain (aggregation interval or frequency)

dimentions.description: The name and the display name of the dimension, i.e. it is a localizable string.

name.description: The name and the display name of the metric, i.e. it is a localizable string.

namespace.description: The namespace the metric belongs to.

primaryAggregationType.description: the primary aggregation type value defining how to use the values for display.

supportedAggregationTypes.description: the collection of what aggregation types are supported.

metricAvailabilities.description: Metric availability specifies the time grain (aggregation interval or frequency) and the retention period for that time grain.

MetricDefinition.description: Metric definition class specifies the metadata for a metric.

value.description: the values for the metric definitions.

name.description: The escaped name of the namespace.

metricNamespaceName.description: The fully qualified metric namespace name.

MetricNamespace.description: Metric namespace class specifies the metadata for a metric namespace.

value.description: The values for the metric namespaces.

MetricRequestPayload.description: Metric metadata filter to fetch the set of metric

average.description: The average value in the time range.

count.description: The number of samples in the time range. Can be used to determine the number of values that contributed to the average value.

maximum.description: The greatest value in the time range.

minimum.description: The least value in the time range.

timeStamp.description: The timestamp for the metric value in ISO 8601 format.

total.description: The sum of all of the values in the time range.

percentile90.description: 90th percentile value in the time range.

percentile95.description: 95th percentile value in the time range.

percentile99.description: 99th percentile value in the time range.

OutputTestArtifacts.description: The output artifacts for the test run.

passFailMetrics.description: Map of id and pass fail metrics { id  : pass fail metrics }.

PassFailCriteria20221101.description: Pass fail criteria for a test.

clientmetric.description: The client metric on which the criteria should be applied.

aggregate.description: The aggregation function to be applied on the client metric. Allowed functions - percentage - for error metric , avg, p50, p90, p95, p99, min, max - for response_time_ms and latency metric, avg - for requests_per_sec, count - for requests

requestName.description: Request name for which the Pass fail criteria has to be applied

value.description: The value to compare with the client metric. Allowed values - error : [0.0 , 100.0] unit- % , response_time_ms and latency : any integer value unit- ms.

action.description: Action taken after the threshold is met. Default is continue.

actualValue.description: The actual value of the client metric for the test run.

ResourceMetricModel.description: Associated metric definition for particular metrics of the azure resource ( Refer : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/monitor/metric-definitions/list#metricdefinition).

interval.description: The interval (window size) for which the metric data was returned in. This may be adjusted in the future and returned back from what was originally requested. This is not present if a metadata request was made.

namespace.description: The namespace of the metrics being queried.

timespan.description: The timespan for which the data was retrieved. Its value consists of two datetimes concatenated, separated by '/'. This may be adjusted in the future and returned back from what was originally requested.

Response.description: The response to a metrics query.

value.description: The value of the secret for the respective type

testId.description: [Required, if test run Id is not given] Load test unique name.

testRunId.description: [Required, if test Id is not given] Load test run unique name.

metrics.description: Metrics collection {metric id : metrics object} (Refer : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/monitor/metric-definitions/list#metricdefinition for metric id).

SupportedResourceType.description: Supported azure resource types for App Component like Microsoft.LoadTestService/loadtests, Microsoft.ClassicCompute, Microsoft.ClassicStorage etc. (Refer for full list of available resource types in azure : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-resource-manager/management/resource-providers-and-types, some of them we are supporting for server side metrics configuration).

secrets.description: Secrets can be stored in an Azure Key Vault or any other secret store. If the secret is stored in an Azure Key Vault, the value should be the secret identifier and the type should be AKV_SECRET_URI. If the secret is stored elsewhere, the secret value should be provided directly and the type should be SECRET_VALUE.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables which are defined as a set of <name,value> pairs.

subnetId.description: Subnet ID on which the load test instances should run.

keyvaultReferenceIdentityType.description: Type of the managed identity referencing the Key vault.

keyvaultReferenceIdentityId.description: Resource Id of the managed identity referencing the Key vault.

createdDateTime.description: The created DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of the test model.

createdBy.description: The user that created the test model.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last Modified DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of the test model.

lastModifiedBy.description: The user that last modified the test model.

nextLink.description: Link for the next list of resources in case of paginated results, if applicable

secrets.description: Secrets can be stored in an Azure Key Vault or any other secret store. If the secret is stored in an Azure Key Vault, the value should be the secret identifier and the type should be AKV_SECRET_URI. If the secret is stored elsewhere, the secret value should be provided directly and the type should be SECRET_VALUE.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables which are defined as a set of <name,value> pairs.

errorDetails.description: Error details if there is any failure in load test run

testResult.description: Test result for pass/Fail criteria used during the test run.

testRunId.description: Unique test run name as identifier

startDateTime.description: The test run start DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format).

endDateTime.description: The test run end DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format).

vusers.description: Number of virtual users, for which test has been run.

subnetId.description: Subnet ID on which the load test instances should run.

createdDateTime.description: The created DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of the test model.

createdBy.description: The user that created the test model.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last Modified DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of the test model.

lastModifiedBy.description: The user that last modified the test model.

nextLink.description: Link for the next list of resources in case of paginated results, if applicable

data.description: An array of data points representing the metric values. This is only returned if a result type of data is specified.

TimeSeriesElement.description: The time series returned when a data query is performed.

TestIdQueryParameter.name: testId
TestIdQueryParameter.description: Unique name for the load test, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

TestIdPathParameter.name: testId
TestIdPathParameter.description: Unique name for the load test, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$.

Endpoint.name: Endpoint
Endpoint.description: URL to perform data plane API operations on the resource.

scopes.https://loadtest.azure-dev.com/.default: OAuth2 scope for Azure Load Test Service
